name: cryptojs-extension
description: Some additional crypto functions built on top of CryptoJS

scripts.test: cd test && node tea.js && node gost28147.js && node gost-streebog.js && node hkdf.js && node blowfish.js && node eax.js && node common.js && node cmac.js && node siv.js && node mode-cfb.js
